name: Crimson Resort and Spa Mactan
description: Crimson Resort and Spa Mactan is a tropical paradise where luxury meets the crystal-clear waters of Cebu. With its stunning beachfront, world-class spa, and exceptional dining, it offers the ultimate island getaway for relaxation and adventure.

name: Henann Resort Alona Beach
description: Henann Resort Alona Beach offers the ultimate Bohol escape with its stunning beachfront location, expansive pools, and luxurious rooms. Surrounded by the beauty of Panglao Island, it’s the perfect destination for relaxation, adventure, and unforgettable memories.

name: Aqua Boracay
description: Aqua Boracay blends modern luxury with the island’s natural beauty, offering stylish accommodations just steps away from the powdery white sands. With its vibrant atmosphere, world-class amenities, and breathtaking views, it’s the perfect spot for both relaxation and adventure in paradise.
